fields.label: Eyebrow Main Title

fields.description: Sets the main title of the teaser.

fields.description: A descriptive text of the subject image.

fields.label: First CTA Type
fields.description: 'Primary' will render button filled, 'Secondary' with an outline.

fields.description: Text to be shown inside button.

fields.name: cta1
fields.label: First CTA Link
fields.description: What link to open when clicking the button.

fields.name: cta2
fields.label: Second CTA Link
fields.description: What link to open when clicking the button.

fields.label: Header Row

fields.description: It will create the first row of the table as the header row.
